titles.title: For the relief of Thomas McDermott, Sr.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.

bill.summary: 2/6/1997--Introduced. Authorizes a named individual to purchase at fair market value specified Federal real property in Grant County, New Mexico, to which such individual's mineral patent application applies. Directs the Bureau of Land Management to enter into negotiations for the purchase of such property.
